title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 517 - Military Rules Of Evidence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 517 - Military Rules Of Evidence

State Regulations
§ 517.1 - General provisions
§ 517.2 - Judicial notice
§ 517.3 - Exclusionary rules and related matters concerning self-incrimination, search and seizure, and eyewitness identification
§ 517.4 - Relevancy and its limits
§ 517.5 - Privileges
§ 517.6 - Witnesses
§ 517.7 - Opinions and expert testimony
§ 517.8 - Hearsay
§ 517.9 - Authentication and identification
§ 517.10 - Contents of writings, recordings, and photographs
§ 517.11 - Miscellaneous rules

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 517

Statutory authority: Military Law, §130.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
